about.title: About RoHub
about.description: RoHub provides legal advice and professional support for Romanians in the UK. We speak your language and understand the challenges you face. We offer non-reserved legal services, documentation and court support with focus on clarity, accessibility and professionalism.

about.point2: Practical court support (McKenzie Friend) in UK courts
about.point3: Trusted partners: Solicitors, Barristers and specialists for complex cases
